mixins.name: rmd-list-unstyled
mixins.description:
A "general" use mixin that will remove the default browser styles for a list and apply the
optionally provided margin and padding instead.

usedBy.name: rmd-list
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a list.

parameters.name: padding
parameters.description: The amount of padding to apply.

parameters.name: margin
parameters.description: The amount of margin to apply.

mixins.name: rmd-list
mixins.description: Creates the styles for a list.

usedBy.description: Creates all the styles for lists and list items.

mixins.description: Creates the styles for an icon that is placed within a list item.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a list item.

mixins.name: rmd-list-item
mixins.description: Creates the styles for a list item.

usedBy.name: react-md-list
usedBy.description: Creates all the styles for lists and list items.

mixins.name: rmd-list-link
mixins.description: A simple mixin for creating the basic LinkList styles.

usedBy.name: react-md-list
usedBy.description: Creates all the styles for lists and list items.

mixins.name: react-md-list
mixins.description: Creates all the styles for lists and list items.

variables.name: rmd-list-vertical-padding
variables.description: The amount of padding to place before the first list item and after the last list item in the list.

see.name: rmd-list-dense-vertical-padding
see.description: The amount of padding to place before the first list item and after the last list item in the list.

usedBy.name: rmd-list
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a list.

variables.name: rmd-list-horizontal-padding
variables.description:
The amount of padding to place to the left and right of all the list items. It is recommended
to keep this value at `0` and instead update the `$rmd-list-item-horizontal-padding` instead to
get better clickable areas and hover effects on each item.

see.name: rmd-list-dense-horizontal-padding
see.description:
The amount of padding to place to the left and right of all the list items in a "dense" layout. It
is recommended to keep this value at `0` and instead update the `$rmd-list-item-horizontal-padding`
instead to get better clickable areas and hover effects on each item.

see.name: rmd-list-item-horizontal-padding
see.description: The amount of horizontal padding to apply to each list item.

usedBy.name: rmd-list
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a list.

variables.name: rmd-list-line-height
variables.description:
The line height to apply to all items within the list. The default typography applied to lists uses
the `subtitle-1` typography specs, but it looks better to apply the main text line-height within lists.

usedBy.name: rmd-list
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a list.

variables.name: rmd-list-dense-font-size
variables.description: The font size to use for a "dense" list layout.

usedBy.name: rmd-list
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a list.

variables.name: rmd-list-dense-vertical-padding
variables.description: The amount of padding to place before the first list item and after the last list item in the list.

usedBy.name: rmd-list
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a list.

variables.name: rmd-list-dense-horizontal-padding
variables.description:
The amount of padding to place to the left and right of all the list items in a "dense" layout. It
is recommended to keep this value at `0` and instead update the `$rmd-list-item-horizontal-padding`
instead to get better clickable areas and hover effects on each item.

see.name: rmd-list-horizontal-padding
see.description:
The amount of padding to place to the left and right of all the list items. It is recommended
to keep this value at `0` and instead update the `$rmd-list-item-horizontal-padding` instead to
get better clickable areas and hover effects on each item.

see.name: rmd-list-item-horizontal-padding
see.description: The amount of horizontal padding to apply to each list item.

usedBy.name: rmd-list
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a list.

variables.name: rmd-list-item-height
variables.description:
The default height for a list item. To help create more general lists and layouts this height will
be applied as a `min-height` instead of `height` so that it can grow in height based on the content.
When using the `ListItem` component, it will automatically "upgrade" to use `height` when the `secondaryText`
or list item "addons" are provided to help enforce the material design specs.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-base
usedBy.description: Creates the base list item styles.

variables.name: rmd-list-item-vertical-padding
variables.description:
The amount of vertical padding to apply to each list item. This is really only added to help with the
default "growing height" case of items since the list item is aligned using a centered flexbox.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-base
usedBy.description: Creates the base list item styles.

variables.name: rmd-list-item-horizontal-padding
variables.description: The amount of horizontal padding to apply to each list item.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-base
usedBy.description: Creates the base list item styles.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-addon-icon
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for an icon that is placed within a list item.

usedBy.name: rmd-tree-item-at-depth
usedBy.description:
Creates styles to add additional padding to tree items based on depth. This will only work
if you correctly apply the `aria-level` attributes to the list items.

The formula used for creating padding is:
```scss
$padding: (($depth - 1) * $incrementor) + $base;
```

variables.name: rmd-list-item-medium-height
variables.description:
The height for a "medium" sized list item. This will normally get applied
for any list item that has an icon or avatar.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-base
usedBy.description: Creates the base list item styles.

variables.name: rmd-list-item-large-height
variables.description:
The height for a "large" sized list item. This will normally get applied
for any list item that has secondary text with no icon, avatar, or graphic.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-base
usedBy.description: Creates the base list item styles.

variables.name: rmd-list-item-extra-large-height
variables.description:
The height for an "extra large" sized list item. This will normally get applied
for any list item that:
- is single line but has a graphic
- has secondary text with an icon, avatar, graphic, or metadata

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-base
usedBy.description: Creates the base list item styles.

variables.name: rmd-list-item-three-line-height
variables.description: The height for a list item with three lines of text.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-base
usedBy.description: Creates the base list item styles.

variables.name: rmd-list-item-text-keyline
variables.description:
This is the amount of spacing from the left side of the list item (excluding padding) up to the left side
of the text when there are additional list item "addons" (excluding large graphics). This is used to update
the spacing between the "addon" and the text to always match this value.

usedBy.name: rmd-list-item-addon-icon
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for an icon that is placed within a list item.
